映.definition: to reflect (light); to shine; to project (an image onto a screen etc)

映像管.definition: CRT (cathode ray tube) used in a computer monitor or TV, aka picture tube (Tw); kinescope

映入.definition: to appear before (one's eyes); to come to (one's mind)

映入眼簾.definition: (idiom) to greet the eye; to come into view

映入腦海.definition: to come to mind; to come to one's attention

映射.definition: to shine on; (math., linguistics etc) mapping

映襯.definition: to set off by contrast; antithesis; analogy parallelism (linguistics)

映象文件.definition: (computing) disk image (aka image file); ISO image
